overview: An American boy turns out to be the heir of a wealthy British earl. He is sent to live with the irritable and unsentimental aristocrat, his grandfather.
tagline: WHETHER YOUR HEART IS YOUNG OR OLD...THIS GREAT PICTURE TELLS A STORY THAT WILL TOUCH YOU DEEPLY!
cast: Freddie Bartholomew|Dolores Costello|C. Aubrey Smith|Guy Kibbee|Henry Stephenson
